EmailTemplate.name: 10-19-21 BNK Accelerate Magazine Post Event.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Want more of what you learned at JAC|SEC 2021?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Interested in learning more about the hot topics discussed at last week’s JAC|SEC virtual event? The latest issue of NCR’s digital-first magazine, Accelerate, is loaded with expert insights. Inside, you’ll find an exclusive interview with NCR’s CTO, Tim Vanderham, on the future of cryptocurrency and what financial institutions need to know and act on now. Plus, uncover expert insights on: - What Gen Z really wants from their banking relationship - How NCR and Google Cloud tackle the toughest challenges in banking - What’s next for AI and conversational banking - How to max out returns on your digital transformation efforts ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
